channel.title: Shugart on JDBlog
channel.description: Recent content in Shugart on JDBlog

item.title: Dumping old Sharp MZ-800 Floppy Disks
item.description: My old sharp MZ-800, needing some brush up. On top the original floppy cable and parts of the MZ-1F19 floppy disk drive, as well as a shugart-adapter. The original case of the MZ-1F19 was misused in the 90ies to host a CD writer an is now lost. After the Atari 600XL, the Sharp MZ-800 was my second computer, back in the 80ies. Since I still had the computer and a box of more 35 year old 5.
